Package hu.bme.mit.theta.solver.smtlib.impl.generic

Class GenericHornSolver

java.lang.Object
hu.bme.mit.theta.solver.smtlib.solver.SmtLibSolver
hu.bme.mit.theta.solver.smtlib.impl.generic.GenericHornSolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
HornSolver, Solver, SolverBase, UCSolver, AutoCloseable
public class GenericHornSolver extends SmtLibSolver implements HornSolver
This solver expects the Horn solver-style proofs for counterexamples

    • getUnsatCore

      public Collection<Expr<BoolType>> getUnsatCore()
      Description copied from interface: UCSolver
      Get an unsat core, i.e., a (not necessarily) minimal subset of the expressions that are already unsatisfiable. It only works if expressions were added by UCSolver.track(Expr) or UCSolver.track(Iterable). Furthermore, it should only be called if SolverBase.check() was already called and the result is UNSAT.
      Specified by:
      getUnsatCore in interface UCSolver
      Overrides:
      getUnsatCore in class SmtLibSolver
      Returns:
      Unsat core
